title: American English “invisible letters” include the t in pizza, the r in...
content:
American English ‚Äúinvisible letters‚Äù include the t in pizza, the r in colonel, and the extra b in cummerbund. Maybe this is a Midwestern thing, but I recently noticed that I add an l to both: bolth. (My daughter does it too but not my son.)

üí¨ Join the discussion on kottke.org ‚Üí
author: Jason Kottke
